text: Kursky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Sergiyevskoye Rural Settlement of Giaginsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 127 as of 2018. There are 5 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located 0.5 km south from Sergiyevskoye, 32 km south-east from Giaginskaya and 32 km north-east from Maykop, on the right bank of the Fars River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Giaginsky District
title: Kursky, Republic of Adygea
